name: Dark Gray Redesign Userstyles
description:
This is a version of userstyles that has the same background as the Dark Gray Google and a little bit of the same feel with the colour scheme. I also made the font BlacklightD. Sorry but inorder to see it with BlacklightD you need to have it installed on your computer but it will still show as the original font style if you don't have it.

In my recent update I disabled all the ads at the bottom of the site.

discussions.name: Can't see text in text fields
